title: Mastermind of May 9 conspiracy confesses his crimes: Tarar
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 23 (APP): Minister for Information, Broadcasting, Culture and National Heritage Attaullah Tarar Tuesday demanded strict action against the Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) and its founder who, according to him, orchestrated and facilitated the May 9 conspiracy to attack more than 200 military installations, the Corps Commander House Lahore and other important buildings.
According to the Information Minister, the leader of the “Tehreek-e-Intishar” has finally confessed his crime of “planning and facilitating” the May 9 tragedy. His family members found instructing outside the Corps Commander House Lahore to attack the building.
He said the PTI sought nothing but violence, chaos and anarchy to do political point scoring on the “dead bodies”.
Petrol bombs were manufactured at Zaman Park which was used as a training headquarters for “terrorists”, who were trained there to attack the state, the minister alleged.
The PTI founder did everything in his capacity to harm the national interests and security, he said while accusing him of writing a letter to International Monetary Fund to default the country, hatching the cipher conspiracy and defiling the memorials of the martyrs on May 9.
He said strict action against the “Tehreek-e-Intishar” was a matter of the national security and national interests.
